name: Drowned Beast
description:
Short Summary: 

This game is a fast paced shoot em up action game where you are a character called Chuck Mullet the crocodile, You traverse through levels fighting enemies to make your way to the end and have to fight the Beast.

Controls

Use the arrow keys to navigate through the main menu.

The arrow keys are also used for controlling the character and the aiming cursor 

R to jump, (Hold) S to Shoot, R + S to roll.

You do not need a high end computer to play this game.

Created By:

Kelvin O'Brien Hamilton - Lead UI Designer

Lorne Hawke - Lead Programmer

Bradley Morris - Lead Art Asset Designer

William Van Pelt - Programmer

The music added was an 8bit remix of the album Polygondwanaland made by King Gizzard And The Lizard Wizard and released for free on 17 November 2017

Original Album: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=OLAK5uy_kZx-hTxk_EfczAhOP3eQT-kJlBsH7NJXs

Disclaimer:

This game was created by 4 people over the course of 8 weeks, we appreciate any feedback and opinions, This is a beta version and was made for a class project that we took further with production.

Thank you for taking the time to view/play our game.
